author: archyworldyscom
title: ARTEC Group Race 2024 Unveiled
text:
The ARTEC Group Race was presented in shades of blue and on this occasion, in addition to the 21 km Half Marathon, it will have distances of 12 and 5 km. The thirteenth edition will take place next Sunday, November 10.
For the Autopop-Autocentro 21 K, the start will be at 7 in the morning on Boulevard Miguel Alemán de Gómez Palacio, with the FINISH at the Autocentro de Rodríguez Triana in Torreón, but not before passing through Ciudad Lerdo. As for the 12K, the start will be at 8 in the morning on Boulevard Independencia, while the 5K, in Campestre Torreón, will be at 8:30. Both will finish at the Autocentro, like the Half Marathon.
All proceeds from the registration fees will go to the Blue Sonrisa Foundation, a center that treats people with autism.
Registrations are made at Autopop, Autocentro, Audi Center Laguna and in the Venustiano Carranza Forest, as well as online at www.carrerasmx.com.mx.
The recovery fee for 21K will be 500 pesos, while for 12 and 5K, 390. The categories in 21 and 12K in both branches will be Free (Up to 29 years), 30-39, 40 -49, 5059 and 60 years and over. In the 5K, both male and female, Libre and the collaborators of Grupo ARTEC.
#ARTEC #Group #Race #Unveiled
